title: WaPo Guide To Living Comfy In The Apocalypse 07.08.22
itunes:title: WaPo Guide To Living Comfy In The Apocalypse 07.08.22
description:
In episode 1283, Jack and guest co-host Joelle Monique are joined by actor, comedian, and writer, Clare O'Kane, to discuss… Washington Post Tells Us Some Sane Tips for Surviving a Mass Shooting, Popeye is the Latest Soldier in the Culture Wars and more!

  1. Washington Post Tells Us Some Sane Tips for Surviving a Mass Shooting
  2. Popeye is the Latest Soldier in the Culture Wars
  3. Oklahoma theater posts warning sign about same-sex kiss in Pixar's 'Lightyear'
  4. San Antonio cartoonist takes over ‘Popeye’ Sunday strip with big plans for changes to the iconic strip
  5. ‘I yam amphibious’: Is Popeye the Sailor a non-binary icon?

LISTEN: House in LA by Jungle

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
